doc.field: MELAMINE CHEMICALS FILES FOR INITIAL OFFERING

Melamine Chemicals Inc> said it has filed for an initial public offering of 2,800,000 common shares through underwriters led by PaineWebber Group Inc PWJ>. The company said it will sell 1,400,000 shares and the rest will be sold by Ashland Oil Inc ASH> and First Mississippi Corp FRM>, Melamine's two shareholders. Proceeds will be used to build a new melamine plant, buy the existing plant from Ashland and First Mississippi and part of a special dividend to Ashland and First Mississippi. In Ashland, Ky., Ashland Oil said it is selling 700,000 shares and First Mississippi 700,000 of Melamine. Reuter
